contents.text: PP2A were low. The expression stability of EFla was the highest in the geNorm program under different concentrations of不同浓度Cd2+胁迫下烟草实时荧光定量PCR Cd2+ stress， followed by GAPDH，TUB， PP2A，ACT and 18SrRNA. The NormFinder analysis showed that the expression stability rank was EFla>TUB>GAPDH-PP2A>ACT>18S rRNA.
